A beautiful small hotel (villa with 3 floors and several rooms) located on the "beach promondory" of the Costa Nova" near Aveiro. You need to choose a room (at a higher price) with a sea view (this means an inner bay, not the open ocean) - these rooms are larger with a big balcony and the view is much nicer than the opposite rooms facing the street.  The rooms facing to the street are also very small. The ocean view also allows you to see flocks of flamingos with binoculars or a cell phone etc. The surroundings are very nice, cute typical Portuguese colorful striped houses, long promenade along them and along the sea. Right next to the hoel is an excellent fish restaurant, fruit/vegetable shop and market with fish, other goodies, cheese, wine, olives pastries and of course a fish restaurant upstairs, pharmacy and big parking place. The beach - open ocean - is a few minutes walk away. The beaches are gorgeous - long stretches of wild, sandy, but manicured beaches, with restaurants where you can watch amazing sunsets while having a carafe of sangria. By car it's a few minutes to the centre of Aveiro and the university, but there is a bus service too. Breakfast is possible in the detached building of the hotel, where there is also a reception with 24 h-service (about 50 m from the hotel villa). The cleaning is precise. Overall, I definitely recommend the hotel - we spent a little over a week here as part of a business trip (scientific conference at the university) and a shorter holiday.
